News.headline: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v Bromley
News.page_title: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v Bromley
News.URL_keywords: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v Bromley
News.short_description: Tickets for the Daggers re-arranged home clash against Bromley are now on sale
News.description:
Bromley visit The Chigwell Construction Stadium on Tuesday 21st February, with a 7:45pm kick off, after our home game against them which was due to be played Saturday 21st January had to be postponed due to a frozen pitch.

Ticket prices can be found here. Under-10s are FREE if purchased in advance of matchday with an adult equivalent. 

Individual tickets can also be purchased on-line, on the phone and in the club shop. 

Purchase:
Online:www.daggerstickets.co.uk
Phone: 020 8592 1549 ext 21   
Club shop: Opening Times
